Name: The University
Author: Crypticant
Description: The University of Griffonshire is an institution dedicated to learning the ways of the world.

Rooms.Name: The Northwestern Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a grandiose arena that could have once held thousands of spectators. There is a sense of history and awe that surrounds the place.

Rooms.Name: The Northern Section of the Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see the ancient ruins of the Colosseum, which was once a grand arena for gladiatorial combat and other public entertainment. The massive stone structure is now overgrown with vegetation, and its once-elegant facade is crumbling. But even in its current state, the Colosseum is an impressive sight, and it's easy to imagine the crowds of people who once cayou here to watch the games.

Rooms.Name: The Northeastern Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, imposing building made of white stone. There are many columns and arches around the perimeter, and you can see people milling about inside. The building is surrounded by a busy street, and there are many people walking by.

Rooms.Name: The Western Section of the Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, ancient arena that was once used for public entertainment. There are now only ruins, but You can imagine the cheers of the crowds that once filled this place. You see a vast open space, with stone seats rising up in tiers on all sides. You see the remains of arches and walls, and You can imagine the grandeur of this place in its heyday. You are awed by the history and the scale of the Colosseum, and you are filled with wonder at the thought of all that has happened here.

Rooms.Name: The Center of the Grand Colosseum
Rooms.Description: The Colosseum is an oval amphitheatre in the centre of the city of Rome, Italy. Built of concrete and sand, it is the largest amphitheatre ever built and is considered one of the greatest works of architecture and engineering. The Colosseum is situated just east of the Roman Forum. Construction began under the emperor Vespasian in AD 72, and was completed in AD 80 under his successor and heir Titus. The Colosseum could hold, it is estimated, between 50,000 and 80,000 spectators, having an average audience of soyou 65,000; it was used for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles such as mock sea battles, animal hunts, executions, re-enactments of famous battles, and dramas based on Classical mythology.

Rooms.Name: The Eastern Section of the Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, ancient arena that is used for gladiatorial games and public spectacles. You see a large, deep hole in the center of the arena, where the floor would have been. This is where the animals and gladiators would have fought.

Rooms.Name: A Lounge
Rooms.Description: You see people walking in and out of A Lounge, soyou carrying drinks and others not. The lounge has a few tables and chairs inside, as well as a bar. There is a sign on the door that says "21 and over only".

Rooms.Name: The Southwestern Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, open space with a dirt floor. There are rows of stone seats on either side of the space, and a stone platform in the center. There are no walls or ceilings, and the sky is visible overhead. There are trees and other plants around the perimeter of the space.

Rooms.Name: The Southern Section of the Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, ancient arena made of stone. There are rows of seats around the perimeter of the arena, and in the center there is a space where gladiators or animals would have fought. You can imagine the cheers of the crowd and the blood that must have been spilt here. It's a fascinating and sobering place.

Rooms.Name: The Southeastern Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, oval-shaped arena with rows of stone seats surrounding it. In the center of the arena is a sand-covered floor. There are four main entrances to the arena, and each one has a series of arches above it. Above the arches are statues of gods and goddesses.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: In your student dorm room, you see a lot of clothes, which are mostly dirty and need to be washed. You see a lot of shoes, which are also mostly dirty and need to be cleaned. You see a lot of trash, which needs to be taken out. And finally, you see a lot of dust, which needs to be dusted.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dorm room with a bed, desk, and chair. There is a window with a view of the city. The room is clean and orderly.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. It is a small room with a bed, a desk, and a chair. There is a window in the room that overlooks the city. The room is clean and tidy.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. The room is small and cramped, with a bed, a desk, and a chair. There is a window, but it is small and there is not much light. The walls are bare and there is not much decoration. The room looks clean and tidy, but it is not very comfortable.

Rooms.Name: The Entrance to the Colosseum
Rooms.Description: You see a large, ancient structure made of stone. There are many people walking around it, taking pictures, and enjoying the view. The Entrance to the Colosseum is an impressive sight, and it is definitely worth a visit if you are in the area.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. There is a bed, a desk, and a chair in the room. The walls are white and the floor is carpeted. There is a window in the room, and you can see the city skyline outside.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. There is a bed, a desk, and a chair in the room. The walls are white and the floors are made of wood. The room is clean and there is a window in the room.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: There is a student dormitory room in the city. You see a small bed, a desk, and a chair. There is a window in the room, and the sunlight is shining in. You see a few books on the desk, and an oil lamp. There is a backpack on the floor, and a pair of shoes. The room is tidy and clean.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is dimly lit by a lamp on the desk. There is a bed in the corner with a stack of books on the nightstand. The desk is cluttered with papers and some empty potion bottles. There is a window with the blinds drawn.

Rooms.Name: The End of the West Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: There are a few people walking around, and the dormitory hall is pretty quiet. The walls are a light beige color, and there are some dark blue lockers lining the hall. There are some paintings on the walls, and a few windows along the hall that let in some natural light. There are some doors leading to other rooms, and at the end of the hall is a stairwell.

Rooms.Name: The West Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long, straight hallway with pale green walls and a dark green carpet. There are doors along the hallway at regular intervals, and each door has a small window. There are also small windows along the top of the walls.

Rooms.Name: The West Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long hallway with many doors leading to student dormitories. The walls are a light color, and the floor is carpeted. There are many students walking around, and soyou are sitting on the floor talking or studying. There is a desk at the end of the hall where a student worker is sitting.

Rooms.Name: The West Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long, narrow hallway with doors leading off to student dorm rooms on either side. There are windows at the end of the hallway, letting in natural light. The floors are clean and the walls are decorated with posters and artwork. There is a sense of community here, with students interacting and studying together in the common areas.

Rooms.Name: Entrance to the West Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a group of students walking together and chatting. They seem to be enjoying each other's company and seem to be in a good mood. The sun is shining and the sky is clear.

Rooms.Name: An Arched Garden Path
Rooms.Description: You see a path made of bricks that curves around a garden. The garden has a variety of flowers and plants. You see people walking on the path and enjoying the scenery. The path leads to a bench where people can sit and enjoy the view.

Rooms.Name: The Student Dining Hall
Rooms.Description: The student dining hall on campus is an ornate room with a beautifully painted, arched ceiling. There are several wooden tables here with chairs. A small window in the back has a woman's head poking out of it. Seems you may be able to order a snack here.

Rooms.Name: An Arched Garden Path
Rooms.Description: You see a busy city street with a lot of traffic and people walking by. The path is lined with trees and there are benches along the path. There is a fountain in the middle of the path and people are walking by it.

Rooms.Name: Entrance to the East Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of people walking around and talking. The dormitory is a big, brick building with a lot of windows. There are trees and bushes around it, and a few benches. There is a sidewalk leading up to the entrance, and a few stairs. The entrance is a big, metal door with a handle.

Rooms.Name: The East Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long, narrow hallway with many doors leading off of it. There are many students walking up and down the hall, and some are talking to each other. There are also some students sitting on the floor, leaning against the walls. The hall is well-lit and there is a window at the end of it.

Rooms.Name: The East Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long hallway with many doors leading to student dorm rooms. There is a window at the end of the hallway that overlooks the city. The walls are painted a light blue color, and the floor is carpeted. There are several students walking around or sitting on the benches that line the hallway.

Rooms.Name: The East Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: The East Student Dormitory Hall is a long, narrow hallway with pale green walls and a marble floor. There are doors along the hallway, most of which are closed, but some of which are open to reveal small, cramped bedrooms. There are no windows in the hallway, and the only light comes from oil lamps on the walls. The atmosphere is one of quiet desperation, and the only sound is the occasional footstep or door closing.

Rooms.Name: The End of the East Student Dormitory Hall
Rooms.Description: You see a long, straight hallway with a smooth, shiny floor. The walls are a light blue color, and there are many doors along the hallway. Some of the doors are open, and you can see people inside the rooms. There are also some windows along the hallway, letting in natural light.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is dimly lit by an oil lamp on the desk. There is a bed in the corner with a person lying in it, and there are some clothes strewn about on the floor. There is a window with the blinds drawn, and through it you can see the city lights.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dorm room that is in the city. There is a bed, a desk, and a chair in the room. The bed is unmade and there are clothes on the floor. The desk is cluttered with books, papers, and a some empty bottles. The chair is next to the desk. There is a window in the room that overlooks the city.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: The student dormitory room is small and cramped. The walls are lined with bunk beds, and there is a small window at the far end of the room. The floor is covered with a thin layer of dust, and the air is thick with the smell of sweat and stale ale. There are clothes and shoes strewn about the room, and empty tankards litter the floor. Despite the mess, the room has a certain charm to it, and it is clear that the students who live here are comfortable with each other.

Rooms.Name: The Shoppe of Magic
Rooms.Description: The Shoppe of Magic is a small shop located in the City of Griffonshire. The shop is filled with various items related to magic, including potions, scrolls, wands, and more. The shopkeeper is a friendly older woman who is happy to help customers find what they need.

Rooms.Name: The School of the Occult
Rooms.Description: You see a large number of people walking around in what appears to be a very orderly fashion. There are many different types of people, all of whom seem to be very focused on something. There doesn't appear to be any type of chaos or confusion.

Rooms.Name: The School of Herbalism
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of greenery and nature. You also see a lot of people walking around and enjoying the scenery. The School of Herbalism is a great place to relax and learn about nature.

Rooms.Name: The School of Thieves
Rooms.Description: You see a school for thieves. It is a place for them to learn how to be better thieves. You also see a city full of thieves. They are all around you, trying to steal from you.

Rooms.Name: The Blacksmith
Rooms.Description: You see a blacksmith in the city. He is working at his forge, hammering hot iron on an anvil. He is surrounded by tools and materials, and he is wearing a blacksmith's apron. You can hear the sound of his hammer ringing on the metal, and the air is filled with the smell of hot iron.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. The room is small and cramped, with a single bed in the corner and a desk in the other corner. There is a window in the room, but it is covered by a curtain. The walls are bare, and the floor is covered in a thin layer of dust. There is a faint smell of stale air in the room.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You see a student dormitory room that is in the city. The room is small and has a bed, desk, and chair. There is a window in the room that looks out onto the city. The room is clean and organized.

Rooms.Name: A Student Dormitory Room
Rooms.Description: You are walking in a student dormitory room in the city. The room is small and cramped, with a bed, a desk, and a chair. There is a window, but it is covered with a curtain. The walls are bare. There is a door, but it is closed.

Rooms.Name: The School of Magic
Rooms.Description: There are many different types of magical creatures living in The School of Magic. You see dragons, unicorns, wizards, and fairies. They all seem to be living in harmony with each other. The City of the Dead is a beautiful place, and it is very peaceful here.

Rooms.Name: The Halls of Magic
Rooms.Description: You see ancient walls covered in arcane symbols, floors lined with rows of candles, and shelves overflowing with dusty tomes. In the center of the room is a large, circular table with a crystal ball in the center. Around the table are hooded figures, their faces hidden in shadow.

Rooms.Name: The Halls of War
Rooms.Description: You see a long, dark hallway with stone walls and a concrete floor. The hallway is lit by torches, and there are various weapons and armor on the walls. You see a few orcs walking around, and You hear the sound of battle in the distance.

Rooms.Name: The School of War
Rooms.Description: The School of War is a dark and foreboding place. The walls are lined with skulls and bones, and there is a feeling of death and destruction in the air. You can see the ghosts of soldiers fighting and dying, and the ground is soaked with blood. This is a place of great sadness and tragedy, and you can feel the pain and suffering of those who have died here.

Rooms.Name: The School of Alchemy
Rooms.Description: You see a school with high walls and a large gate. Inside the school, there are students walking around or sitting in the courtyard. There are also several large buildings with classrooms and laboratories. In the center of the school, there is a large tower with a clock on it.

Rooms.Name: The School of Divinity
Rooms.Description: You see a large, imposing building with many windows and several towers. The front entrance is flanked by two stone lions, and there are numerous students and staff milling about. Inside, the building is very grand and well-appointed, with stained glass windows and hardwood floors. There are classrooms, offices, and a library, as well as a chapel. The atmosphere is one of learning and contemplation.

Rooms.Name: The Central Lawn
Rooms.Description: You see a beautiful green space with plenty of room to roam. The grass is well-manicured, and there are plenty of trees and shrubs to provide shade and privacy. You also see a large pond with ducks swimming in it, and a few benches where people can sit and enjoy the peaceful surroundings.

Rooms.Name: The School of Scouts
Rooms.Description: You see a school with a playground and a few children playing. The children are all wearing uniforms and there is a sign that says "The School of Scouts." You see a few adults walking around and a few horses in the parking lot.

Rooms.Name: The School of Rogues
Rooms.Description: You see a school for rogues. You see people who are skilled in the art of thievery. You see a city that is full of crime. You see a place where you can learn how to be a better thief.

Rooms.Name: The University Atrium
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of people walking around and soyou are sitting down on the benches. There are also soyou trees and plants around. The atrium is a really big space and it's really bright because of all the windows.

Rooms.Name: Before a Bright Tunnel
Rooms.Description: You stand before a large portal to your future. Your early life is behind you, and your future lies directly north. Before you enter the world, you have decided to attend the University, and learn what is required of you. Enjoy your time here, for it only gets more dangerous outside! Walk north to begin.
